item.title: Futuristic Contract For Love Relationships
item.content:encoded: The app will provide guidance on communication, so that misunderstandings can be minimized and trust can be built. The goal is to help unmarried couples navigate their relationships with honesty, trust, and transparency.

item.title: Futuristic Contract For Love Relationships
item.content:encoded: Mental health is important in relationships, so the app will provide a voluntary compensation system that provides entitlement for compensation for the soul pain that follows a breakup for example.

item.title: Futuristic Contract For Love Relationships
item.content:encoded: The app should regulate claims in a similar or even better way than the actual law surrounding marriage, but in a way that ensures trust, honesty, and communication between partners.

item.title: Futuristic Contract For Love Relationships
item.content:encoded: The challenge is to build an app for a futuristic love contract for unmarried partners seeking a mature and honest relationship. It is about preventing legal fights healing costs for physical and mental health.

item.title: Futuristic Contract For Love Relationships
item.content:encoded: The partners agree that lying and betraying entitles the other person to compensation for healing costs and emotional damages

item.title: Futuristic Contract For Love Relationships
item.content:encoded: The language of love can be expressed in many different ways, every partner must say to which percentages words of affirmation, acts of service, physical touch, quality time, gift-giving are relevant

item.title: Futuristic Contract For Love Relationships
item.content:encoded: The app should check what kind of relationship the two partners wish: for example monogamous or polyamorous relationship. If the both agree on it or they wish also casual sex relationships or on something else.
